entry.title: YouTube Alexa Edition - Auto Screen Detection Broken
entry.summary: As of a few days ago the youtube alexa skill no longer detected if devices had a screen or not. I have developed a small fix. Download this version by clicking here Set the variable Circled above to yes if your device has a screen…
entry.content:
As of a few days ago the youtube alexa skill no longer detected if devices had a screen or not. I have developed a small fix.

Download this version by clicking here

Set the variable Circled above to yes if your device has a screen or no if it does not.

Remember to enter your api and your dl link in the boxes.

This Should act as temporary fix for this issue.

entry.title: YouTube skill V3 update
entry.summary: The YouTube skill has received a new update which fixes many of the bugs that have been reported. The setup is the same but the fuction of the skill has been made so much more stable. The skill now has more than 2176 users.
entry.content: The YouTube skill has received a new update which fixes many of the bugs that have been reported. The setup is the same but the fuction of the skill has been made so much more stable. The skill now has more than 2176 users.

entry.title: YouTube Skill V3
entry.summary: The new YouTube V3 skill by andrewstech has been released to the world for everyone to enjoy. The skill features both audio and video playback. The skill will not be released to the alexa skill store but instead you will have to build it yourself.
entry.content:
The new YouTube V3 skill by andrewstech has been released to the world for everyone to enjoy. The skill features both audio and video playback. The skill will not be released to the alexa skill store but instead you will have to build it yourself. The skill is easily put together, and requires no credit card as we are not using aws. For the instructions click here. 

Video released on Saturday 11th of April 2020 at 10:00 GMT

entry.title: Watch this space
entry.summary: Over the next few days I will start uploading custom built skills made by the community for both google and alexa. Tutorials and setup links will be uploaded here. If you have a skill that you would like to be featured then email: skills@andrewstech.me
entry.content:
Over the next few days I will start uploading custom built skills made by the community for both google and alexa. Tutorials and setup links will be uploaded here.

If you have a skill that you would like to be featured then email: skills@andrewstech.me
